speaker: ACHILLES
text:
Come
               
              here
               
              about
               
              me
              ,
               
              you
               
              my
               
              Myrmidons
              .

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
Mark
               
              what
               
              I
               
              say
              .
               
              Attend
               
              me
               
              where
               
              I
               
              wheel
              .

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
Strike
               
              not
               
              a
               
              stroke
              ,
               
              but
               
              keep
               
              yourselves
               
              in
               
              breath
              ,

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
And
              ,
               
              when
               
              I
               
              have
               
              the
               
              bloody
               
              Hector
               
              found
              ,

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
Empale
               
              him
               
              with
               
              your
               
              weapons
               
              round
               
              about
              .

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
In
               
              fellest
               
              manner
               
              execute
               
              your
               
              arms
              .

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
Follow
               
              me
              ,
               
              sirs
              ,
               
              and
               
              my
               
              proceedings
               
              eye
              .

speaker: ACHILLES
text:
It
               
              is
               
              decreed
               
              Hector
               
              the
               
              great
               
              must
               
              die
              .
